citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. There are accumulations of loose hay, bedding, dirt, and debris under the two metal racks housing guinea
pigs and on the wall behind these racks. Ineffective cleaning and can expose the animals to disease hazards and health
problems. Correct by ensuring the premises are kept clean, including removing accumulations of loose hay, bedding, dirt,
and debris; routinely dusting off and sanitizing all surfaces on the inside of the facility; and maintaining a level of general
cleanliness to support good animal husbandry and health. Correct by February 1, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.31(b) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. There are accumulations of loose hay, bedding, dirt, and debris under the two metal racks housing guinea 
pigs and on the wall behind these racks. Ineffective cleaning and can expose the animals to disease hazards and health 
problems. Correct by ensuring the premises are kept clean, including removing accumulations of loose hay, bedding, dirt, 
and debris; routinely dusting off and sanitizing all surfaces on the inside of the facility; and maintaining a level of general 
cleanliness to support good animal husbandry and health. Correct by February 1, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
